mapper.select: select time.movie_time_code, movie.movie_name, m_screen.screen_name, time.movie_screen_count, to_char(schedule.movie_start_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), to_char(schedule.movie_end_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), time.movie_start_time, m_screen.screen_total_seat from tbl_movie_time time, tbl_movie movie, tbl_movie_screen m_screen, tbl_movie_schedule schedule where time.movie_code = movie.movie_code and time.screen_code = m_screen.screen_code and time.movie_schedule_num = schedule.movie_schedule_num and time.movie_code = 'MC1' and m_screen.theater_code = 'TC3';
